resources.string: Chennai Tour Guide
Places to Visit
Restaurants
Theatres
Beaches
Malls
Restaurants
Marina
Marina Beach, Triplicane, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India
marina1
marina2

Marina Beach is a natural urban beach in the city of Chennai (Madras), India, along the Bay of Bengal. The beach runs from near Fort St. George in the north to Foreshore Estate in the south, a distance of 6.0 km (3.7 mi), making it the longest natural urban beach in the country.
Elliots Beach
Elliots Beach, Besant Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India
elliot1
elliot2

Elliots Beach (popularly known as "Besant Nagar Beach" or "Bessie") is located in Besant Nagar, Chennai, India. It forms the end-point of the Marina Beach shore and is named after Edward Elliot, onetime chief magistrate and superintendent of police, Madras. It has the Velankanni Church and the Ashtalakshmi Kovil nearby.
Tiruvottiyur Beach
Tiruvottiyur Kuppam, Appar Nagar, Tiruvottiyur, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600019, India
tiruvottiyur1
tiruvottiyur2

Tiruvottiyur (Thiruvottriyur or TVT) is a neighbourhood in North Chennai administered by the Greater Chennai Corporation. It is part of the Tondiarpet division, located to the north of Chennai city. It is one of the 15 administrative zones in Greater Chennai Corporation. The zone is named to be Zone 1 (Tiruvottiyur). Due to its proximity to Parrys and Chennai Central along with comparatively cheaper residential space and decent amenities, it is fast becoming a sought after residential destination.
Phoenix Marketcity
142, Velachery Main Road, Velachery, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600042, India
Phoenix Market City (Chennai) is a shopping mall developed by Phoenix Mills Limited located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India. It was opened in January 2013 and is the 2nd largest mall in the city.
Chennai Citi Centre
No.10 11, Dr.Radhakrishnan Salai, Loganathan Colony, Mylapore, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600004, India

The Chennai Citi Centre is a shopping mall in Mylapore, Chennai, India. It opened on 3 March 2006 and is located on Radhakrishnan Salai. According to Cushman and Wakefield, a global real estate consultancy firm, it is one of the most expensive shopping malls in Chennai.
Spencer Plaza
768 769, Anna Salai, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600002, India
Spencer Plaza is a shopping mall located on Anna Salai in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India, and is one of the modern landmarks of the city
The Forum Vijaya
NSK Salai, Arcot Road, Vadapalani, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600026, India

Forum Vijaya Mall is a shopping mall located in Vadapalani, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India, developed by Prestige Group. This mall is spread over 6,36,000 square feet of retail space. More than 100 shops occupy its four floors
Annalakshmi Restaurant
18 3 Rukmani Lakshmipathy Road Sigapi Achi Building,1st floor, Adjacent to Raja Muthaiya, Rani Meyammai Hall, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600008, India
Temple-themed vegetarian restaurant offering northern and southern Indian and Jain cuisine.
The Marina
39, College Road, Nungambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600006, India
Environmentally-conscious restaurant plating sustainable Indian and Chinese style fish and seafood.
Fusilli Reasons
2/64, Ormes Rd, Kilpauk, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600010, India
Tiny, laid-back eatery turning out an array of garlic breads and pastas, along with nachos.
Little Italy
No 112, Eldorado Building, Nungambakkam High Road,, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600034, India
Chic contemporary chain dining room for traditional Italian food, gelato and some Mexican dishes.
SPI Cinemas - Sathyam
8, Thiru Vi Ka Road, Royapettah, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600014, India
Cinema and entertainment complex with a cafe, theatre and patisserie as well as video games.
SPI Escape Multiplex
Express Avenue Mall, Whites Rd, Express Estate, Royapettah, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600014, India

SPI Cinemas is a leading player in the entertainment industry offering services such as exhibition, distribution and production. SPI Cinemas strives to be at the forefront of media technology and endeavours to bring new entertainment technology to customers first.
Ega Multiplex
810, Poonamallee High Road, Vasu Street, Kilpauk, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600010, India
Standard cinema with air conditioning offering an array of movies and a snack counter.
AGS Cinemas - Villivakkam
No.1/1, Mettu Street, Behind Bus Depot, Villivakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600049, India
Modern movie theatre with a loyalty scheme, showing their own productions and other Hindi films.
